title: I Lied
lyrics:
I'm like really casual
I never get attached, you know, nuh-uh
I don't want you like that at all
I just ain't like that
I'm totally comfortable
To keep it kinda common goal, uh uh

No, I'm not that emotional

I just ain't like that



But the more time I spend with you

The more I feel like it just ain't true



I lied

(And then again and again)

One touch turned into a million

And it just got out of hand

I lied

(And then again and again)

One night turned into at least ten

And it just got out of hand

I



You say you don't like to commit

I just wanna have fun with it, nuh-uh

A-rum-pum-pum-pum with it

'Cause you just ain't like that

But suddenly you can't fall asleep, yeah

Not unless you lying next to me, yeah

Even though we both agree that we ain't like that



But the more time I spend with you

The more I feel like it just ain't true



I lied

(And then again and again)

One touch turned into a million

And it just got out of hand

I lied

(And then again and again)

One night turned into at least ten

And it just got out of hand



I

(Lied)

I

(Lied)



Didn't mean to go for the deep end

But when it comes to you, got no defense

Ooh, ooh, yeah

No, no, no, I can't fall asleep, yeah

Not unless you lying next to me, yeah

Guess I need ya



I lied

(And then again and again)

One touch turned into a million

And it just got out of hand

I lied

(And then again and again)

One night turned into at least ten

And it just got out of hand



I

(Lied)

I

(Lied)
